title: Clip 2 - Interview with Dennis Davis/ Phaedrus -  Insanity​ or Enlightenment? Tao vs Quality?
description:
#Zen_and_the_Art_of_Motorcycle_Maintenance #Pirsigs_Journey

One topic Dennis and I share interest is was Phaedrus' breakdown truly a  manifestation of psychosis, or what it enlightenment? Maybe it was both. Meditation provides insight during an altered state of consciousness,. Isn't that what happened? This opens up a debate into the nature of "mental illness". 

 Dennis provides a beautiful description of the meditative process and its benefits.

Also, what is the relationship between Quality with Tao? Are they the same or different? In our culture,​ we remain tied to the scientific worldview. What did Pirsig​ think about this?




Link to the full video at the end of this clip
